backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking feature IDs to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying a light theme and rendering the Valentine flow with floating hearts.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationScree: Displays the post-acceptance celebration view with headings, an image, a message, and a static footer.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates randomized floating heart emojis animated upward as a background effect.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Creates a circular burst animation of hearts based on randomized angles and distances.
frontend/src/components/QuestionScreen.t: Renders the main question screen with the RHUTHUN title, Valentine question, Yes button, and teasing bubble behavior.
frontend/src/components/TeasingMessage.t: Animated bubble message positioned with coordinates and rotation for teasing interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and caching of backend actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication logic using Internet Identity, including login, clear, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useTeasingBubbles.ts: Custom hook that shows timed or interaction‑triggered teasing bubbles with random messages, positions, and rotation while avoiding the Yes button.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables and several animation keyframes for bubbles, hearts, fades, and UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineScreen.tsx: Manages the two‑screen Valentine flow and transition animation between the question and celebration views.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for a two‑page Valentine experience with teasing bubbles, animations, and celebratory content.
